@graph.title: Islamic modernities in Southeast Asia : exploring Indonesian popular and visual culture
abstract: Introduction : Islamic-themed popular and visual culture and images of modernities -- Urban Islamic spectacles : transforming the space of the shopping mall during Ramadan -- Islamic rock music and imaginations of modernities -- Islamic self-help books and governmentality -- Muslim masculinity and feminity in Islamic-themed films -- Liking, wearing, and sharing Islamic modernities : Indonesian and Malaysian Muslim fashion bloggers -- Unearthing the past and re-imagining the present : contemporary art and Muslim politics in a post-9/11 world -- Conclusion : Islamic modernities and the politics of plurality
"Demonstrates how new Islamic modernities are being negotiated and constructed through popular and visual culture in Indonesia"--
@graph.creator: gnd:1139710850
@graph.P30128: Asian cultural studies: transnational and dialogic approaches
